channel.title: CVE Feed for Webangon -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Webangon -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47383|2024-10-07T14:12:33.452Z -- webangon -- the%20pack%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Webangon The Pack Elementor addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Pack Elementor addons: from n/a through 2.0.8.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-38768|2024-08-07T14:42:59.755Z -- webangon -- the%20pack%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Webangon The Pack Elementor addons allows PHP Local File Inclusion, Path Traversal.This issue affects The Pack Elementor addons: from n/a through 2.0.8.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-32785|2024-04-24T10:22:25.213Z -- webangon -- the%20pack%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Webangon The Pack Elementor addons allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects The Pack Elementor addons: from n/a through 2.0.8.3.
